title: Venezuela Bondholders Huddle as Maduro Ouster Fans Payout Hopes
description: As prices on Venezuela’s bonds soared Monday, a group of the country’s longtime creditors huddled to discuss how the US ouster of President Nicolas Maduro will affect their ability to recoup some of their investment in about $60 billion of Venezuela’s defaulted debt.
content: As prices on Venezuela’s bonds soared Monday, a group of the country’s longtime creditors huddled to discuss how the US ouster of President Nicolas Maduro will affect their ability to recoup some of their investment in about $60 billion of Venezuela’s defaulted debt.
